website_summaries.verdict: This consistent bundt pan that bakes evenly, for the good results you expect every time.
pros: Easy to clean because the ridges are not deep
Cake comes out easily with very little effort
Handles help with putting it in and taking it out of the oven, as well as removing the cake
Pan is made from a thick metal, giving it some heft
cons: While this pan comes with a 10 year warranty, it can get nicks in the nonstick coating over time, which will rust and make the pan unusable

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Cake!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a snake cake for my grandson's birthday. Cake baked evenly and released perfectly. I used the Baker's Pam and sprayed generously each time. The pan has a nice weight to it so I'm sure it will hold up well. I always hand wash all baking pans and dry immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Once and awhile Baker!
customer_reviews.text: I can make a Bundt cake without it fall apart and getting stuck in the pan! I'm not saying these are professional quality but for the once and awhile bundt cake, this is great! I use very little oil and it falls out perfectly every time! They also clean easily as well!
customer_reviews.author: Professional Shopper Girl

customer_reviews.title: Non -stick that is ACTUALLY non-stick. Without any prepping ...
customer_reviews.text: Non -stick that is ACTUALLY non-stick. Without any prepping of the pan, the bundt cake came right out of the pan as soon as I turned it over, without taking any of the cake with it. Very heavy duty pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non stick surface is extremely easy to remove cake from (having using baking spray of ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality bundt pan. Non stick surface is extremely easy to remove cake from (having using baking spray of course) and extremely easy to clean. For the price of this quality item, you spend less here than on a much lesser quality item at your average grocery or kitchen store. It is heavy duty without being heavy weight. I appreciate the handles for ease of removing the cake from the oven. The ridges could be a little fancier, but would not change my ordering decision based on the other pluses.
customer_reviews.author: Anya York

customer_reviews.title: Great nonstick pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan and I use it mostly when I make monkey bread which is very sticky. Nothing sticks to this pan. It's heavy duty and not flimsy like the other one I had. The nonstick coating has held up well even going through the dishwasher. Great price for this too.
customer_reviews.author: tmagent

customer_reviews.title: I bought this pan and then found out you can’t even buy a Bundt cake mix anymore like the old days
customer_reviews.text: I am domestically challenged. I bought this pan and then found out you can’t even buy a Bundt cake mix anymore like the old days. However, with Pam baking spray and a little cake mix ingenuity, my first effort at using this pan could not have come out better. Not one crumb remained in the pan when I flipped it over. This is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Shanteuse

customer_reviews.title: Very Excellent Pan !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality pan. It baked my bundt & filling evenly & with a spray of baking cooking spray, it slid out perfectly. I'm not a Baker, I'm a cook & this pan made baking a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ranaa

customer_reviews.title: Bad product 😠
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this article, I bought it two weeks ago and the molds already have rust. I lost money plus the molds because I had to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Mirelys Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pan, but still needs butter
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for church pound cakes, hoping that the "non-stick" would be non=stick. The pan without butter, stuck a bit (about 4 inches worth.) the pan lightly coated with butter, didn't stick. Next, I tried butter & a popular non-stick spray: Butter didn't stick, spray pooled to the bottom of the pan.....I moped the spray and tried to re-coat. Stuck. However, the pans are very well made, very sturdy. Even though these are dishwasher safe, I washed by hand. Well, there you have it. Would I buy again? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: CR Mainwearing

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baking pan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooking tool. I use it instead of other baking pans for an even bake that gives an attractive product. I tried baking a Corrone and couldn’t get it to hold its shape. Used the bundt pan and voila’!
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bundt pan. Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Used to make a spice cake. Didn’t even need to grease the pan - she slid right out! Heavy weight, much better quality than grocery store pans.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great bug
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't made a bundt cake in years, but a friend gave me a great recipe I wanted to use. I purchased this pan and I couldn't be happier. It's heavy, very sturdy, but the finish allows the cake to come out perfectly!! I was very excited. Pans I've used in the past always wanted to "keep" pieces of the top of the cake. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: I ALREADY LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: It got here yesterday and I washed it then put it to work immediately. I sent the cake to work with my wife and just got the call that the cake was awesome. I can take credit for the flavor but that cake slid right out of that pan with no issues at all. It was super clean and all I had to do then was give her a good wipe and she is ready to go again.
customer_reviews.author: Phearitige

customer_reviews.title: It's About Time
customer_reviews.text: This really lives up to the good reviews. I made a trial run cake for a friend in my old fluted bundt pan, and it was a disaster. The order for this pan went in, and the old pan went in the trash. The pan was here a day early, and now I have a lovely cake. The pan was the right size for my recipe, and it came out of the pan beautifully. Easy to handle, but not a tinny pan.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bond

customer_reviews.title: Decent but would buy NordicWare
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of the price and it was the "recommended" pan. However, the lines on the cake came out muted. Looked more like a tube cake than a bundt cake. If I were to get another one, I would get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bundt
customer_reviews.text: I like very sturdy bakeware, and this is solid. It's not like the flimsy kind with hot spots that leave you with an unevenly baked cake. Heat is consistent. And, when you flip your cake on the cooling rack - it all comes out perfectly You may need to reduce the temperature by 10-15 degrees as this is a dark pan and watch your time a bit more carefully. This seemed to bake faster than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Dropped this pan a few times, but it cleans super well. Wife made a honey cake for Rosh Hashanah and it came out super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Average Home

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! It baked up a beautiful carrot cake that my family loved. I greased and floured the pan (as my recipe directed) and it slid out easily. The pan itself had a good weight to it and you can feel that it's well made, not some cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and the handles make it easy to move in and out of the oven but it is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: kathy t gadd

customer_reviews.title: Great Wilton Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wilton is known for making quality bakeware. The fluted tube pans are Amazon amazing!! This is a lightweight pan with a non-stick coating. Makes wonderful cakes with a nice design. The flutes are not deep so cleaning is a breeze. Make sure not to overfill and use a drip pan underneath if needed.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great classic bundt pan that was easy to handle and sturdy without being too heavy or too flimsy. With proper greasing, my bundt cake came out very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: DiL

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly sturdy product at almost any price. But for this price, it’s superb! I wouldn’t hesitate to give it as a gift. It’s a breeze to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Dian Marchese

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan for my granddaughter because I had one when I was her age. She's 12. Well, she was out of Spam but baked anyway. That beautiful cake 🎂 came right out of the pan. It's made sturdy and easy to clean. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design and function.
customer_reviews.text: Wife retired her mothers 50 yr old plus bundt pan. Purchased two of these and she loves them, great results every time. Loves the non stick feature and the handle design great for placing in and removing from oven and turning over to remove the cake.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: EASY clean up! Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pan! I’ve only used it twice so far but it is amazing! I made a blueberry cake and it cooked evenly, came right out and cleaned up like a dream. I also made monkey bread which is a gooey mess. I didn’t even need to use soap during clean up. Warm water and ‘voila’ = clean. The pan is a bit heavy, but for me the easy clean up is worth it. Of note, I did use cooking spray both times because they were holiday dishes and I couldn’t take any chances.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Definitely been making many more cakes since I purchased this pan.
customer_reviews.author: michael mathis

customer_reviews.title: Grease and flour pan if told to
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews, thought my pan didn't need grease and flour since it was brand new, and ended up serving trifle made with cake pieces instead of the showpiece I'd anticipated. Not non-stick enough for my chocolate bundt cake (from scratch) to come out in 1 piece.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy and cheap compared to Target prices
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great bargain, the item was so easy to clean and it was cheaper for the two and you could barely get one for the same price at Target. Walmart had them cheaper but the quality was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy Release, first try!
customer_reviews.text: After months of holding my breath before trying to remove cakes from my old bundt pan, I was able to exhale when the cake released from this pan. I was very, very pleased with it, first try. Can't wait to bake the next one. Highly recommend this pan.
customer_reviews.author: TrishaDee

customer_reviews.title: Browns the outside too much
customer_reviews.text: I have read that darker baking pans can cause the outside to bake before the inside is done, and I found that to be the case here. I had to adjust the baking time and still wasn't happy with the results. I'll stick to lighter colored baking pans.
customer_reviews.author: ADOWNS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. It’s sturdy, has handles, making it easy to take out of a hot oven, and is so easy to clean. The cake slides right out of the pan when it’s cooled. So happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: A.F.T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan .
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bundt pan, easy to clean. My cake flipped out of pan with ease , and kept its shape. I would highly recommend buying this. Great price for a heavy duty pan like this.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed is how "heavy" and sturdy this Bundt pan is. Not like cast iron of course, but much better than cheap WalMart type pans. Had no issue with cake sticking. Cleaned very easily. This will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and really is “no stick”!
customer_reviews.text: Super great quality. It’s no stick is no joke. Everything I have cooked in it has come right out after cooling down a bit. Wilton products have always done well for us!
customer_reviews.author: Ol Murph

customer_reviews.title: Great baking pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan works as advertised. My cakes come out perfect and the pan is easy to clean. I bake more cakes now because there is assurance the cake will no longer stick to the pan. This is a favorite baking pan of mine.
customer_reviews.author: A Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan, worried about scratches
customer_reviews.text: Love how it has a place to grab the pan on both sides. This makes it easy to take in and out of the oven. However, I noticed when I used a fork or spoon to get the bread out, there were scratches left behind. I am hoping that it doesn't cause the material to come up and end up in the food. Will edit my review in future months if it does.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect results every time
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bundt pan. Perfect results every time. Cake comes out easily. I do use vegetable shortening and flour each time to grease pan. Pan works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick
customer_reviews.text: The cake pan performed as expected, cake did not stick. I followed the instructions on the cake mix package, cake came out clean. Some of the negative reviewers said their cake stuck, they must have missed a step a step or not followed the cake mix instructions properly. Wilton is a top of the line product used by many professional chefs.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Finally the perfect buntpan
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase another bunt pan, because they scratch so easily. I liked until I found a Teflon with handles on the sides (I am tired of sticking my oven mitt in my cake) This one is PERFECT. Does all the things I want in a bunt pan.
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before and had to buy again. Husband threw out first ones by mistake. I love these, sturdy easy to clean never had a problem with anything sticking
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bundt pan
customer_reviews.text: Made only one case so far but WOW it doesn't stick at all. I never have had an easier time getting cake out of a cake pan. The hand grips are wide enough for your potholders. The cake batter didn't stick even in those tricky middle and edge parts. Great buy and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: RDA

customer_reviews.title: The grand-kids helped make a pumpkin cake in it and loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Have already used it several times in last 2 months. The grand-kids helped make a pumpkin cake in it and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but made in China
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, heavy weight but I'm very disappointed they're made in China. I'd looked everywhere for country of origin, couldn't find one but thought Wilton is an old, trusted, USA company.
customer_reviews.author: Wistful

customer_reviews.title: Best cake pan
customer_reviews.text: Best pan I have ever owned. Cakes come out perfect I do lightly butter and flour my pans. No sticking parts. Recommend. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Sampan

customer_reviews.title: favorite cake pan
customer_reviews.text: Shucks. I am making all my cakes in this pan now! Everything tastes great out of this easy to use bundt pan. I would buy it again, but I only need one. LOL
customer_reviews.author: kathy Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bundt cakes!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the same Bundt pan since I got married (30 years) and it was time to say goodbye. I was drawn to this one, first of all the brand and then the shape. It is very sturdy and I love that it has handles to make it easier to remove it from the oven. After cooling, the cake came out smoothly. I am very pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W

customer_reviews.title: I am glad we got it
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace another Bundt type pan we had. It had too many deep crevices and was a nightmare to clean. This pan is lovely and so much easier to clean with the more gentle shallow curves. I am glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Mama

customer_reviews.title: My pineapple cake came out great
customer_reviews.text: Like this pan, made a pineapple cake in it...turned out well for a first time recipe. Check on the timing though, depending on your oven because pan is dark metal which seems to brown cake and bake faster. But used my convection oven setting.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Susie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pan
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a number of times - it is solid, totally non-stick, easy to use and clean, and most definitely sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Bookie

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Surpassed my expectations. Can't find a single complaint. Made-In-the USA quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Bountiful Bundt Pan
customer_reviews.text: I received the order promptly and just used it today. It's perfect. I made an apple cinnamon cake and it came out the pan easily. No sticking and no crumbs left behind. Excellent quality baking pan. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Toomey

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 - minus 1 star for POOR PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: Great bundt pan but packaging?! Ummm could there be something?! It came by itself in a box. Zero protection.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Made a Seven Up Pound Cake and after cooling the cake slipped out the pan with ease. Pan cooks evenly
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s fantastic to bake in
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bundt pan ! I baked 8 cakes in one day , they came of pan perfectly. Highly recommend this brand .
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bundt cake pan
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, It is well made, non stick coating, cooks a perfect bundt cake..
customer_reviews.author: tamara foster

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome nonstick surface, just make sure your cake is cooled COMPLETELY before you remove it, or big chunks don’t come out. The second time I used that baking spray on the pan and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline J Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Cake slipped right out!
customer_reviews.text: All I did was lightly rub some butter on the pan, didn't even flour it. The first cake I made just slipped right out of the pan with no loosening required. Awesome. Can't wait to use it again. This pan has a nice, heavy feel to it, not flimsy like cheaper bundt pans. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: abalonegal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth bundt pan I’ve purchased in my lifetime. From Teflon to silicone, my cakes were always sticking. This is the first one I’ve had that I can get the cake out in one piece! And it’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy the pan is and how easy it is to clean, even cooking spray comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie2309

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bundt cake pan. My cake came out nice and smooth no tears on the sides. It was very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: akaliz

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I have not baked with it yet, however it looks very well made and I like the handle feature.
customer_reviews.author: Chowsrus

customer_reviews.title: round fluted cake pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan makes a beautiful cake, I will put filling in them then drizzle icing over the top, makes a beautiful presentation. clean up is a breeze even tho it is fluted. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: First time success
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the first time ever making a bundt cake and the pan is great. Sturdy and easy to clean. I buttered and floured the pan and no issues for removal.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Made my first bundt cake for Valentines day. I made sure to grease the pan with some oil and the cake came out perfectly after allowing it to cool for about 20 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N Grim

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive tools
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a good addition to your baking tools. They do a great job and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Yiuglow

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bakes evenly, cleans up well, is sturdy for baking and it bakes a great cake. Can not ask for more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Non stick wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: So far so great!!! I made the perfect bundt cake ever! It was a hit! Pumpkin chocolate chip cake 😋 cake plopped right out,it did not stick at all! I'm happy lol
customer_reviews.author: Alana Joy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This is my first tube pan, baked my first bourbon vanilla pound cake, the flipping came out perfect! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: VH12

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how heavy this is which is not a complaint because it means that it will distribute the heat evenly during baking. I am very pleased with this Bundt pan.
customer_reviews.author: sandrine

customer_reviews.title: Great bundt pan
customer_reviews.text: Best bundt pan I have used. Cake came out without any problems. Nice heavy quality. Nice coating.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Allen

customer_reviews.title: Exactlywhat I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Sturdy. Haven't used it yet, but seems like cakes will come out easily and it will be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carlotta Marshell

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan, Great Quality, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is very high quality and the price cannot be beat for this Wilton pan. I have used it on several occasions since purchase and have been totally satisfied with the results. Just wondering why I didn't purchase it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Mschloe

customer_reviews.title: Bundt Pan is for the Granddaughter -Nothing Better
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my 11 year-old Granddaughter and she loves this pan. She bakes her pound cakes two or three times a-week using this pan. She says it is the best pan to bake and cleans it as soon as the cake comes out and is cool to ensure it stays nice and cleans.
customer_reviews.author: FOCUS

customer_reviews.title: Non stick
customer_reviews.text: This pan is so easy to clean! I do not need any other bundt pan! This one is great! I have already baked cakes several times in it and they came out of the pan perfectly. No sticking to this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Graham the Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! And the thin plastic protector can be used as a cake cover. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Throw your old pan away! This is the one you need!
customer_reviews.text: Cake doesn't stick to pan and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to uss
customer_reviews.text: All easy to use and clean, bakes well would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I never owned a Bundt pan before. After doing lots of research I ended up purchasing this pan. I’m very happy with my purchase. The nonstick worked well and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Bundt perfection
customer_reviews.text: Cake came out with no issue, and pan hardly needed to be clean
customer_reviews.author: Jody Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Great Bunt cake product!!
customer_reviews.text: Wilton is a long time excellent brand, from my years of cake decorating. The pan is light weight, easy to clean, a quality product!!
customer_reviews.author: linda byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a non-stick pan. I used it a few times and nothing stuck after transferring. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great so great I end up buying another one I do a lot of cake baking and they are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect to make a banana bread
customer_reviews.text: or pineapple upside down cake. Work well if you want to make your meatloaf a little fancy
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Pan works fine, it is just more shallow and the ridges less pronounced than I hoped for them to be.
customer_reviews.author: YMS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cake pan
customer_reviews.text: I made a chocolate brownie cake in the pan, and it was perfect! No sticking at all when I turned the pan over to remove the cake. I love the good sized handles on the side!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bundt the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great non-stick cake pan. This is my 3rd one. The only type of bundt cake pan I will use. I’ve used plenty of other brands and my cake always sticks, but never with this Wilton.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Renaud

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this being non-stick and if the cake would release. Works perfectly. Beautiful cake.
customer_reviews.author: Char in IN

customer_reviews.title: Truly non-stick!
customer_reviews.text: This pan makes a perfect cake. It is truly non-stick. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JBL

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best baking dish I have bought yet. I make the tastiest and prettiest cake with this mold.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Great to make a cake and not stick in the pan. Love my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bakeware!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. After use you can just take a wet rag with soap and water and wipe clean. No scrubbing needed.
customer_reviews.author: karen spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. Heavy duty, Anyone buying it would be pleased
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Like everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. It's well made and medium heavy duty. I really like the clear,hard plastic packaging; it can be used to store the pan. I expect many years of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Novice gardener

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, we still grease it and the Pound cake falls right out.
customer_reviews.author: MCT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my last pan that the coating peeled off of it and decided to go with this one. I was happy with quality of the pan as well as how easy it was to clean and food didn't stick to it! Would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bundt Pan
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, nice finish, easy to clean and my cake popped right out with no problem
customer_reviews.author: sem

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one after reading all the good reviews but did not pay much attention about the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one after reading all the good reviews but did not pay much attention about the indentation of the pan. The indentation is really the big disappointment for me. I’ve only using it once. The cake did came out easily but the form not pretty at all compare to my other bundt pans. The indentation is barely there..😢😢
customer_reviews.author: Evy Syartika

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: excellent this is where you compare, on spending a lil more.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Very Large
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell from the description what the size or volume was on this fluted pan. I was looking for a pan about 1/2 have this size. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It distributes heat evenly and cooked the prettiest cake that I have ever made. Exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Vornes

product_meta.title: Wilton Perfect Results Premium Non-Stick 9-Inch Fluted Tube Pan
product_meta.description: Size:Single packNot only can you bake one of those delicious ring cakes in this pan, you can make monkey bread, baked macaroni and cheese and even roast a chicken. Who knew?
feature_bullets: Fluted tube pan lets you get creative with your cooking and baking
Dishwasher safe; however for best results, wash in warm, soapy water before first and after each use
